reviewText: I received this video as a gift at a tantra class I attended. This video is not meant to be porn or to teach you how to have finger sex with a woman but it's about the man giving and sharing his energy of love with a woman.  It reflects sensuality, touch, pleasure you give without penile penetration and the sacred beauty and power of a yoni massage.  Yes, the video did appear somewhat corny, but it is not so bad. Now Attention to detail:  I was not fascinated with the fact the male model had dirty fingernails which should never go inside a yoni.

This video shows how a man needs to learn how to focus on his woman and pleasure her to the heights of ecstasy. As corny as they do it with the Goddess language, she is a great teacher and so sensual and beautiful. It's pretty amazing how she would expose herself in such an intimate way for the camera but she is genuinely responsive and sharing of herself in a way that is so powerful, one is left to only feel gratitude for the experience. Let's hope more men can catch on...
It was unlrealistic to expect that one or two videos could get me there. The hyped advertising helps in the delusion.
If this works for 10-15% of people I would be surprised. I really didn't learn anything I didn't know before. I imagine some people wouldn't know.

This is a pretentious video.

It is purported to tell the viewers how to make love

to women.  But I doubt it has succeeded.

Be warned the video might not be exciting to some people.

It is something between hard-core and soft-core.

There is a penetration by finger, but nothing else.

I have no Idea why I watched the whole movie it was all about her

I felt sorry for the guy

Wild Wendy
Turn the sound off. Run this DVD at 60 times normal speed. Then, you'll have a "high" concept sex comedy every man can enjoy.

The movie was well done not some cheap porn film. It lacked in instruction and explanation of what was going on. I did lern some from the movie but I am looking for other sourses for better more detailed instruction. When i buy an instructional video I want to learn something.
